1569900.name: Fried Chicken in Wonderland
1569900.description:
Prologue
Fried Gatsby, a fried chicken, finds himself being chased by the police after becoming a drug suspect. Desperate to escape, he plunges into a sewer, only to discover that it's much deeper than he expected. Falling endlessly, he eventually lands in a mysterious and unknown world called The Heart Kingdom in Wonderland. However, he quickly realizes that he must remain cautious. While he may have evaded the police, even more terrifying and dangerous challenges may await him here, as the country is engulfed in a civil war.

But amidst the chaos, Gatsby may also find new and unexpected connections in the ongoing war between the Playing Cards. No matter what lies ahead, he is determined to do whatever it takes to secure his future.

Welcome to the Heart Kingdom, and enjoy the madness.





Features
This side-view action game focuses on Boss Raids as its main content. Gatsby, who works as a dancer, will employ his exceptional dancing skills in Dubstep, Rock, or Cinematic BGM to fight against enemies.

The boss enemies will possess weapons and battle skills that reflect their personalities and preferences. Gatsby may have the opportunity to disarm them or seize valuable items after defeating them. These items will prove useful in battles and enable readers to achieve Steam achievements. Once readers complete the story on the normal difficulty, they can challenge themselves by reading it again at the highest difficulty, where Gatsby can acquire unique boss items more easily.

As Gatsby progresses through the story, he will learn about the lives of the people living in Wonderland. Along the way, he may even gain new companions who will join him on his journey.
